'''''Minecraft: Soothing Farm Morning''''' is an extended play featuring remixes of various [[music|music tracks]] from ''[[Minecraft]]'', composed by {{w|Andrew Prahlow}}. It was released alongside the ''Relaxing Farm Morning'' [[Minecraft: Soothing Scenes|soothing scene]].<ref>{{mcnet|soothing-scenes-relaxing-farm-morning|Wake up with Soothing Scenes|April 17, 2025|Linn Viberg}}</ref>
